excerpt: "When you think of artificial intelligence (AI), what do you envision? A glowing red eye from 2001: A Space Odyssey, or a humanlike Ava from Ex Machina? For decades, pop culture and science fiction have conspired depictions comprising inspired images of machine-ruled futures and robots accomplishing incredible tasks for human beings."
